txt.en: Quickbeam has remembered how he next wishes to honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
Return to Quickbeam to hear what he has to say
Return to Quickbeam
'I left Lassemista's Seed at Isengard. It will grow and watch the tower, ensuring no evil will come to it again. Lassemista loved to walk the forest though, and I wish to honour his memory.'
Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Speak to Quickbeam
Quickbeam wishes to honour Lassemista by showing he misses him with a single tear.\n\nLassemista's seed has been planted at Isengard.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look around</rgb> at the small island
Speak to Quickbeam
Shed a <rgb=#FF0000>tear</rgb> at Lassemista's Seed
Find the small island
Lassemista's Seed is at Isengard
'On many occasions, Lassemista enjoyed long conversations with Treebeard. To next honour him, I think we should say good-bye to Wellinghall.'
Say <rgb=#FF0000>bye</rgb> to Wellinghall
Quickbeam has thought of how he next wishes to honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
Quickbeam will wish to speak to you about Lassemista.\n\nQuickbeam is at Derndingle.
One of Lassemista's favourite places was a great tree. Quickbeam believes bowing before it will honour his memory.\n\nThe tree can be found in the north-east of Fangorn.
Lassemista enjoyed long talks with Treebeard. Quickbeam believes saying good-bye to Wellinghall will honour his memory.\n\nWellinghall can be found in west Fangorn.
Quickbeam needs to ponder what else would honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Speak to Quickbeam
Quickbeam needs to ponder what else would honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Say <rgb=#FF0000>bye</rgb> to Wellinghall
Find Wellinghall
'Lassemista was my closest friend. He loved the forest more than most others. I will miss him for a very long time.'
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
Shed a <rgb=#FF0000>tear</rgb> at Lassemista's Seed
<rgb=#FF0000>Bow</rgb> before the ancient tree
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
Quickbeam has remembered how he next wishes to honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
Find the ancient tree
Quickbeam and Lassemista used to watch the river from a small island. Quickbeam asked you to go there and have a look around.\n\nThe island is in the river in the centre of Fangorn.
Return to Quickbeam
Speak to Quickbeam
Quickbeam has planted a seed to his fallen friend Lassemista at Isengard. He wishes to honour the memory of his friend.
Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Quickbeam needs to ponder what else would honour Lassemista's memory.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
'I spent many hours with Lassemista watching the river that feeds the forest. There is a small island; having a good look around there feels right.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Look around</rgb> at the small island
Lassemista's Seed
<rgb=#FF0000>Bow</rgb> before the tree to honour Lassemista

'There is one more thing I can think of. Lassemista trusted Saruman, and I know he was deeply wounded by the betrayal. I have planted a seed for Lassemista at Orthanc. To show my sadness, please visit it and let Lassemista know I remember him with a tear.'
